participant_2.background:
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
I'd brag about my ability to stay humble and grounded even when I'm on top of the world.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: Good, I just finished a workout, I'm feeling pretty energized. How about you?
I'm doing alright. I'm getting ready to go on a hike with my girlfriend.
That sounds like fun! I love hiking. I'm from Tennessee too. Where are you hiking?
We're hiking in the Smoky Mountains. I've never been before, so I'm excited to see what it's like.
The Smoky Mountains are beautiful. I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks, I hope so! I'm a little nervous because I'm blind, but I'm sure it will be okay.
Oh, I didn't realize you were blind. That's really cool! I bet hiking is a lot more challenging for you, but I'm sure you're doing great.
Thanks! It is a little more challenging, but it's also more rewarding. I get to experience the beauty of nature in a whole new way.
That's awesome. I'm really glad you're able to enjoy the outdoors.
Thanks! I'm glad you're so supportive.
Of course! I think it's great that you're doing something you love, even though it's challenging.
No problem! Have a great time on your hike!
